dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 350 articles for training and 61 articles for development, totaling 411 articles in plain text format. The title is followed by an empty row and the content of the article starting from the next row, with 16975 sentences in the training data, where 12244 are non-propaganda and 4721 are propaganda.
dcterms:title: NLP4IF 2019 Task 1 Sentence Level Classification (SLC)
